metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36086 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
The CIL compiler in SELinux 3.2 has a use-after-free incil_reset_classpermission (called from cil_reset_classperms_set andcil_reset_classperms_list).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-36086` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsepol1 - 2.7-1ubuntu0.1
sepol-utils - 2.7-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsepol package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7-1ubuntu0.1').
